dt: {bc}a subordinate unit of the Ku Klux Klan

shortdef: ku klux klan; also : a subordinate unit of the Ku Klux Klan

dt: {bc}a violent secret fraternal society founded in 1915 in Georgia to maintain white Protestant cultural and political power
{bc}any one of more than 20 hate {dx_def}see {dxt|hate:1||1c}{/dx_def} groups that associate themselves with the Ku Klux Klan
{bc}a violent post-Civil War secret society founded in Tennessee in 1866 to upend the Black political and social power that was being established during Reconstruction
This Ku Klux Klan had largely dissolved by the end of the 1870s.
